      • findAll

        public java.util.List<Forum> findAll()
        We query the database for all the Forum objects. We create an ArrayList and add into it Forum objects instantiated from the ResultSet.
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface Repository<Forum,java.lang.Integer>
        Returns:
        We return the ArrayList of Forum objects.
